title: Kassadin's Q needs adjustments
body: Kassadin's Q shoots out an orb and provides a shield, but for targets that dies after the projectile of Q (not hit), the ability  still grants Kassadin shield and the orb just disappears where the target was, causing the ability being on CD.

replies.body:
Hey Danieeeel,


As this is the Help & Support sub-boards, we typically only answer general questions and technical issues related to League of Legends. As such, I'd like to direct you to post in the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy)boards because this seems like a suggestion regarding champion/game balance.
